messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a flower county with 21 flower fields. The rose field is connected to the sunflower, tulip, daisy, orchid, hydrangea, and lily fields. The marigold field is connected to the poppy, zinnia, peony, daffodil, chrysanthemum, and carnation fields. The iris field is connected to the lavender, aster, dahlia, hyacinth, jasmine, and snapdragon fields. The hydrangea field is connected to the lily, sunflower, tulip, daisy, and orchid fields. The tulip field is connected to the daisy, orchid, lily, and sunflower. The zinnia field is connected to the daisy, peony, daffodil, chrysanthemum, and carnation fields. The chrysanthemum field is connected to the carnation, poppy, peony, and daffodil fields. The jasmine field is connected to iris, lavender, aster, dahlia, and hyacinth fields. The orchid field is connected to the lily, sunflower, and aster fields. The peony field is connected to the daffodil, carnation, and poppy fields. The daffodil field is connected to the carnation, and poppy fields. The hyacinth field is connected to the snapdragon, lavender, aster, and dahlia fields. The lily field is connected to the sunflower, and daisy fields. The carnation field is connected to the poppy field. The snapdragon field is connected to the lavender, aster, and dahlia fields. The sunflower field is connected to the daisy field. The poppy field is connected to the dahlia field. The dahlia field is connected to the lavender field. The lavender field is connected to the aster field. You have been told that if you visit snapdragon field, you can get a bunch of 50 snapdragon flowers for free and if you visit chrysanthemum field, you can get a bunch of 10 chrysanthemum flowers for free. Now, from the rose field what is the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers? Remember that you can only take one bunch of flowers and only from one field. Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

The user could be a bot or a player. There are 2 types of the bot, one is a helper and the other is a smart helper. The helper bot will never get any score. The smart helper bot, even though it won't get any score, it will learn after a few runs. The player will get score if he/she is correct and will get 0 if he/she fails.
Note: The test cases may contain empty fields or some cases may contain only a single flower name.

a.jpg (14,126,158 bytes)
user: Imagine a flower county with 12 flower fields. The hydrangea field is connected to the tulip, lily, sunflower, and daisy fields. The poppy field is connected to the rose, marigold, and chrysanthemum fields. The aster field is connected to the lily, sunflower, and carnation fields. The orchid field is connected to the zinnia, peony, daffodil, chrysanthemum, and carnation fields. The iris field is connected to the lavender, hyacinth, and hyacinth fields. The rose field is connected to the daffodil and peony fields. The marigold field is connected to the chrysanthemum, carnation, and peony fields. The chrysanthemum field is connected to the carnation, daffodil, and peony. The daffodil field is connected to the carnation, marigold, and rose fields. The carnation field is connected to the peony fields. The peony field is connected to the rose and daffodil fields. You have been told that if you visit hydrangea field, you can get a bunch of 3 hydrangea flowers for free and if you visit marigold filed, you can get a bunch of 1 marigold flowers for free. Now, from the lily field what is the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers(if possible)? Remember that you can only take 1 bunch of flowers and you can only take a bunch from one field. Starting from the lily field, please list the flower names in order, including marig

You are told that the path between orchid field and aster field is now blocked. Instead, the orchid field is now connected to the snapdragon field. Now, from the rose field what is the shortest path that yields the maximum number of flowers? Remember that you can only take one bunch of flowers and only from one field. Starting from the rose field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

Starting from the tulip field, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.
